name: Roo.menu.DateMenu
desc: A menu containing a {@link Roo.menu.DateItem} component (which provides a date picker).

params.name: config
params.desc: Configuration options

config.name: listeners
shadow
config.desc:
True or "sides" for the default effect, "frame" for 4-way shadow, and "drop"
for bottom-right shadow (defaults to "sides")

config.name: defaultAlign
config.desc:
The default {@link Roo.Element#alignTo) anchor position value for this menu
relative to its element of origin (defaults to "tl-bl?")

config.name: subMenuAlign
config.desc:
The {@link Roo.Element#alignTo} anchor position value to use for submenus of
this menu (defaults to "tl-tr?")

config.name: minWidth
config.desc: The minimum width of the menu in pixels (defaults to 120)

config.name: registerMenu
config.desc: True (default) - means that clicking on screen etc. hides it.

config.name: allowOtherMenus
config.desc: True to allow multiple menus to be displayed at the same time (defaults to false)

methods.name: addMenuItem
methods.desc: Creates a new {@link Roo.menu.Item} based an the supplied config object and adds it to the menu

params.name: config
params.desc: A MenuItem config object

returns.desc: The menu item that was added

methods.name: addElement
methods.desc: Adds an {@link Roo.Element} object to the menu

params.name: el
params.desc: The element or DOM node to add, or its id

returns.desc: The menu item that was added

methods.name: isVisible
methods.desc: Read-only.  Returns true if the menu is currently displayed, else false.

methods.name: add

params.name: args
params.desc: One or more menu items, menu item configs or other objects that can be converted to menu items

returns.desc: The menu item that was added, or the last one if multiple items were added

methods.name: addSeparator
methods.desc: Adds a separator bar to the menu

returns.desc: The menu item that was added

methods.name: removeAll
methods.desc: Removes and destroys all items in the menu

methods.name: remove
methods.desc: Removes an {@link Roo.menu.Item} from the menu and destroys the object

params.name: item
params.desc: The menu item to remove

methods.name: getEl
methods.desc: Returns this menu's underlying {@link Roo.Element} object

methods.name: insert
methods.desc: Inserts an existing object based on {@link Roo.menu.Item} to the menu at a specified index

params.name: index
params.desc: The index in the menu's list of current items where the new item should be inserted

params.name: item
params.desc: The menu item to add

returns.desc: The menu item that was added

methods.name: hide
methods.desc: Hides this menu and optionally all parent menus

params.name: deep
params.desc: (optional) True to hide all parent menus recursively, if any (defaults to false)

methods.name: show
methods.desc: Displays this menu relative to another element

params.name: element
params.desc: The element to align to

params.name: position
params.desc:
(optional) The {@link Roo.Element#alignTo} anchor position to use in aligning to
the element (defaults to this.defaultAlign)

params.name: parentMenu
params.desc: (optional) This menu's parent menu, if applicable (defaults to undefined)

methods.name: addText
methods.desc: Creates a new {@link Roo.menu.TextItem} with the supplied text and adds it to the menu

params.name: text
params.desc: The text to display in the menu item

returns.desc: The menu item that was added

methods.name: addItem
methods.desc: Adds an existing object based on {@link Roo.menu.Item} to the menu

params.name: item
params.desc: The menu item to add

returns.desc: The menu item that was added

methods.name: showAt
methods.desc: Displays this menu at a specific xy position

params.name: xyPosition
params.desc: Contains X & Y [x, y] values for the position at which to show the menu (coordinates are page-based)

params.name: parentMenu
params.desc: (optional) This menu's parent menu, if applicable (defaults to undefined)

methods.name: purgeListeners
methods.desc: Removes all listeners for this object

methods.name: on
methods.desc: Appends an event handler to this element (shorthand for addListener)

params.name: eventName
params.desc: The type of event to listen for

params.name: handler
params.desc: The method the event invokes

params.name: scope
params.desc:
(optional) The scope in which to execute the handler
function. The handler function's "this" context.

params.name: options
params.desc: (optional)

methods.name: un
methods.desc: Removes a listener (shorthand for removeListener)

params.name: eventName
params.desc: The type of event to listen for

params.name: handler
params.desc: The handler to remove

params.name: scope
params.desc: (optional) The scope (this object) for the handler

methods.name: addEvents
methods.desc: Used to define events on this Observable

params.name: object
params.desc: The object with the events defined

methods.name: releaseCapture
methods.desc: Removes all added captures from the Observable.

params.name: o
params.desc: The Observable to release

methods.name: removeListener
methods.desc: Removes a listener

params.name: eventName
params.desc: The type of event to listen for

params.name: handler
params.desc: The handler to remove

params.name: scope
params.desc: (optional) The scope (this object) for the handler

methods.name: fireEvent
methods.desc: Fires the specified event with the passed parameters (minus the event name).

params.name: args
params.desc: Variable number of parameters are passed to handlers

returns.desc: returns false if any of the handlers return false otherwise it returns true

methods.name: hasListener
methods.desc: Checks to see if this object has any listeners for a specified event

params.name: eventName
params.desc: The name of the event to check for

returns.desc: True if the event is being listened for, else false

methods.name: capture
methods.desc: Starts capture on the specified Observable. All events will be passed to the supplied function with the event name + standard signature of the event before the event is fired. If the supplied function returns false, the event will not fire.

params.name: o
params.desc: The Observable to capture

params.name: fn
params.desc: The function to call

params.name: scope
params.desc: (optional) The scope (this object) for the fn

methods.name: addListener
methods.desc: Appends an event handler to this component

params.name: eventName
params.desc: The type of event to listen for

params.name: handler
params.desc: The method the event invokes

params.name: scope
params.desc:
(optional) The scope in which to execute the handler
function. The handler function's "this" context.

params.name: options

events.name: mouseover
events.desc: Fires when the mouse is hovering over this menu

params.name: menuItem
params.desc: The menu item that was clicked

events.name: mouseout
events.desc: Fires when the mouse exits this menu

params.name: menuItem
params.desc: The menu item that was clicked

events.name: beforehide
events.desc: Fires before this menu is hidden

events.name: itemclick
events.desc: Fires when a menu item contained in this menu is clicked

params.name: baseItem
params.desc: The BaseItem that was clicked

events.name: beforeshow
events.desc: Fires before this menu is displayed

events.name: hide
events.desc: Fires after this menu is hidden

events.name: click
events.desc: Fires when this menu is clicked (or when the enter key is pressed while it is active)

params.name: menuItem
params.desc: The menu item that was clicked

events.name: show
events.desc: Fires after this menu is displayed
